enhanced_description: Unberry is a modern talent assessment stack designed to transform hiring and talent development by enabling companies to make better, smarter, and faster decisions. It leverages cutting-edge technologies like Generative AI, game technology, Machine Learning, and data science to generate objective and accurate candidate evaluations. Unberry's assessments go beyond traditional methods, mapping a comprehensive candidate footprint that includes functional skills, communication, and critical cognitive & behavioral competencies. It is applicable for hiring across all domains and aims to accelerate skill development, improve learning efficiency, and contribute to building a more diverse and inclusive workforce.
